name: Mabel Pines
info:
• 简体中文名: 梅宝·派恩斯
  • 性别: 女
  • 生日: 1999-08
  • 引用来源: http://gravityfalls.wikia.com/wiki/Mabel_Pines
detail: Mabel Pines is the elder twin sister (by five minutes) of Dipper Pines. Energetic, bouncy, and optimistic, Mabel makes the best of every situation with a big, goofy smile, and a variety of colorful sweaters.
